Package com.emse.spring.faircorp.dao

Class UserDaoCustomImpl

java.lang.Object
com.emse.spring.faircorp.dao.UserDaoCustomImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDaoCustom
@Service public class UserDaoCustomImpl extends Object implements UserDaoCustom
Provides custom data access functionality for users. This class implements the methods defined in the UserDaoCustom interface to provide concrete implementations for interacting with a database of users and roles.
